title: Add "__Secure-" and "__Host-" cookie prefix support
body: This allows a website to ensure that cookies are set with the "secure" attribute (only used over HTTPS), and optionally only be allowed for the current host (set without a Domain attribute, and the path is set to "/").

comments.body: Re: fixing IE's subdomain behavior, implementing this proposal should not be blocked on fixing IE's cookie behavior for subdomains globally.
@eric: bonus points for fixing old bug!
Supporting __SECURE- in Edge/IE is a ~10 line change to WinINET.
